body:
Hey,

Here is my new PvP montage starring the Avicus network, how it works is I recorded a couple of rounds and edited it so it only showed when I got a kill so it only showed the parts when I killed someone. I spent a lot of time editing it and sorry for some low frame rate footage, I did my best!! Here it is!

Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JmLFVjQSGJI

Make sure to click on that like button and comment on ways I could improve or just say I did a good job! :) Make sure to subscribe for more awesome content!! Well, cya on the other side!!

Cheers,
- sheamus

title: Avicus PvP Montage

replies.body: Nice montage, I like your choice of music it fit well! keep up the work!
